page.title: 15Farming
page.content: Before tractors were used,{horses}were used:They called them pairs because every{ploughman}on the farm had a pair of horses to look after,from half past five in the morning until half past five at night.In those days more than ten people were employed on the farm,while today the same work is done by machines. Tractors became more and more popular on farms until now they dont use{horses}on Tayport farms at all. Changes in farming in the near {future}will probably be gradual,and will include;more advanced machinery, changes in the crops and changes in the stock rearing methods,which are always being improved.
